content: निर्झरः --रं A spring, waterfall, cataract, cascade, mountain-torrent; शीतं निर्झरवारि पानं <ls>Nāg. 4</ls>; <ls>R. 2. 13</ls>; <ls>Śānti. 2. 17</ls>, <ls n="Śānti. 2.">21</ls>; <ls n="Śānti.">4. 6.</ls> --रः {@--1@} Burning chaff. {@--2@} An elephant. {@--3@} A horse of the sun.
